name: American Indian Building Enterprises, Inc.
description: A minority-owned management/consulting company that has completed projects for the New York State Department of Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation and is certified by the New York State Department of Transportation. They provide qualified Project Managers and Consultants. They also have satellite offices in Syracuse, NY, and in the American Indian Community House in New York City

name: Seneca Nation Housing Department (SNHD)
address: Cattaraugus Territory, 50 Iroquois Drive, Irving, NY 14081; Allegany Territory, 44 Seneca Street, Salamanca, NY 14779
description: Founded in 1968 to provide housing for low-income native families through Homebuyer Education and Assistance, Rental Housing, Elder Housing, and Homebuyer Opportunities. They also manage the Seneca Nation Mortgage Program
